```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
new_sites <- read_csv(here("data", "mandifore_sites.csv"))
```


```{r}
set.seed(4444)
transect_sites <- new_sites %>% 
  filter(lon > -83 & lon < -82) %>% 
  mutate(lat_round = round(lat)) %>% 
  group_by(lat_round) %>% 
  slice_sample(n=1)
```

ggplot2 map

```{r}
seus <-
  map_data(
    'state',
    c(
      "florida",
      "georgia",
      "south carolina",
      "north carolina",
      "alabama",
      "mississippi",
      "tennessee"
    )
  )
ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(
    data = seus,
    aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group),
    color = "black",
    fill = "#C3ECB2"
  ) +
  geom_point(data = transect_sites, aes(x = lon, y = lat), color = "red") +
  coord_map() +
  theme_void()
ggsave("transect_map.png")
```
